actions.text: Amendment SA 182 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 182 proposed by Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 112. (consideration: CR S1161; text: CR S1161) To give effect to more accurate maps of units of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System that were produced by digital mapping.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 182 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 182 proposed by Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 112.

amends_amendment.purpose: To modify the authorization period for the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation program.

purpose: To give effect to more accurate maps of units of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System that were produced by digital mapping.
